TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content:
Need for Seed: A farmer wants to stop growing GM crops and goes looking for other sources of seed.

Fat Times at Ridgemont High: Mr. Hand finally allows Jeff Spicoli to order all the pizza he wants into class, as long as he shares with everyone. The entire class becomes too fat to go lusting after each other.

Surfs: A bunch of Smurfs create their own surfing group, with the "help" of Sony Pictures Animation and Adam Sandler.

(Original title: Smurfs)

Despicable E

A-D were pretty cool, but.....
MNions: All the minions talk with a strong Minnesoh-tan accent, don'tcha know.

The th Wave.

 

A band of people running from a wave of th's.
"200: A Space Odyssey" a movie about a bunch of Romans discovering space travel.
Star Was: A star goes supernova
Wallace & Gromit Close save. Movie about Wallace & Gromit everytime save the game and close them

Star Wars: The Fore Awakens.

 

The Star Wars gang playing golf.
Suerman: A rich businessman sues people for literally everything, and gets away with it.

Bat-ma:

A story about Bruce Wayne's grandmother.

The Rock Horror Picture Show

A rock seeks shelter from a storm in an old mansion full of rock-crushing tools, including a singing transvestite with a sledgehammer. 

Star Was

The story of a washed-up one-hit-wonder rock star

Edited July 8, 2016 by StrandedonEarth
Big Rouble in Little China -   A former Russian rickroller gets dragged into a centuries-old trololo battle in Chinatown
Ivan Tsarevich and Gay Wolf: Movie about Ivan tsarevich who go to Date with wolf.

The Pink Anther. An entire movie about the fate of pollen from an unusually pink stamen part. Movie may not be suitable to younger or more sensitive audience member do to explicit adult flower content.
The Leo Movie: A movie about people born under the sign of Leo.
The Mation: a movie about the importance of grammar.

Iron Ma: someone makes a metal grandmother.

The Secret Lie of Pets: how your pets lie to you about their plans to overthrow humanity.

Kubo and the Wo Strings: a dude named Kubo gives relationship advice to flirting Chinese strings.

Avengers Age of Uton: Marvel makes a movie about sheep taking over Earth but misspells the title.

How to Train Your Dagon: planetary scientists need to find out how to tame the eccentric orbit of Dagon (Fomalhaut b).

UT Job: the University of Texas is put on a mission to stop squirrels from robbing Donald Trump.
A Clockwork Range: An eccentric rancher has a bunch of different clocks out on the range.
Ineption: Black Hat convinces a bunch of people to become terrible at their jobs, and widespread confusion ensues.
Star Rek: Beyond: Someone manages to rek someone from beyond the Sun.
Treasure plane : plane full of looted treasures

the hing: that's a thing or a bollywood movie about cooking and spice while singin' and dansing and how to fold soup without dune

Edited July 20, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
Sausage Part: A movie about a section of sausage.

Birdemic: Sock and Terror- A horror movie where birds attack humans with socks. Hailed as the best horror movie of all time.

(Original: Birdemic: Shock and Terror- one of the worst movies ever)
